Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista Creatine Kinase (CKI) Flex Reagent Cartridge (K2038)
Dimension Vista Creatine Kinase MB (MBI) Flex Reagent Cartridge (K2032)
Regulation Name(s): Creatine phosphokinase/creatine kinase or isoenzymes test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension Vista CKI and MBI Flex Reagent Cartridges for creatine kinase and creatine kinase MB measurement in serum and plasma.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of creatine kinase and creatine kinase MB isoenzyme activity in human serum and plasma to aid in the diagnosis and treatment of myocardial infarction and muscle diseases including progressive Duchenne-type muscular dystrophy.
